reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our 4th time staying at the Brisa sol, and enjoyed it again. The location is hard to beat 10 minute walk to both strip and oldtown (my favourate).Handy big supermarket next door, lovely pool and snack aera. Pool facing room was very tidy and clean, Beds a bit uncomortable.TV needs upgraded to widescreen (not on holidays to watch tv I suppose). Staff friendly and very helpful. There is a lovely cafe- cake shop at front of hotel, well worth a visit. When you turn left out of hotel towards oldtown the first restraunt you meet is Casa do Chefe, this is a must!!. Would recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Another pleasent stay at Brisa Sol

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is the second holiday we have had at this hotel, first time was in 2001 and 12 years on the standard of the hotel, if anything has improved. Great rooms, spacious, clean, very well appointed, friendly staff.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from a lovely week at this hotel. Great accomodation, up to date appliances and very comfy beds! Good sized balcony and very clean pool-though extremely cold! Refreshing though! We really liked the quiet atmosphere around the pool area - no awful europop music blaring or animation teams bothering you! Just peace and quiet.....
reviews.title: Great hotel!

reviews.text: Location good with centre of town 15 mins walk away and supermarkets and bars etc on the doorstep. Also an excellent Ticket shop for excursions... we got 2 days trips for 13 euros each! Look out for 'next day' deals. Faro was a really good trip.
reviews.title: Good hotel, great value for money

reviews.text: Just back from a stay at this great hotel. All the staff are very helpful and keep the hotel very clean. Pool area is very good. Only a 10 min walk to the Old Town and about 15 to the Strip. The only meal we had at the hotel was breakfast at 8.20 euros and it was very good.
reviews.title: Excellent value for money

reviews.text: Went here Mey 2012 and going back May 2013, hope the weather is good......was good weather last year but not brilliant as a bit cool at times. Initially was disappointed after going in to the hotel which looked fantastic and the staff were lovely, got to the room which had a great pool view, room was fine and really comfy but the kitchen area was a bit rubbish.....but the location made up for this, a short walk each night to the main area and beach, was a nice walk. Huge pool at the hotel and always spare beds, pool was very very cold but bearable there was only 2 or 3 people in it at any time lol mainly couples and the odd baby so nice a relaxing, nice pool side cafe and bar with lovely staff. Indoor pool was nice but very small and very humid. Outside the hotel is the most amazing fantasic brilliant bakery cover all types of meals and amazing cakes and the prices are excellent.......oh and next door to the big supermarket!!! just ideal hence going back......................I recommend this hotel
reviews.title: going back!! thats a good sign......

reviews.text: This was our second stay at the Brisa Sol and we returned because it was so good the first time around. Thankfully, they have kept up the high standards. We stayed in a 1 bed apartment (two adults and one child) - I would really recommend thinking about booking a two bedroom apt if there are four adults as I think it would be asomewhat cramped and the additional bedding (sofas) is not somewhere I'd want to sleep.
reviews.title: Great Apartment - Would Recommend

reviews.text: For us, it was perfect. Location was great as it is a pleasant 10 minute walk into the old town (even pushing a buggy). There are lots of restaurants, cafe's (and takeaways) across the road from the hotel but as they are in a commercial center, they are hardly the most picturesque choice - the real gems are to be found en route to and in the old town.
reviews.title: All 3 visits have been fantastic!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The apartments were very clean with good facilities - towels changed every day, 2 TV's, comfy beds in the bedroom but as I said earlier, the sofa's are not up to much if you need to use them - Thankfully, our daughter is still in a cot . The outdoor pool area is nice and the indoor pool was a godsend in the April weather. As we visited in low season the kids club was not running but the area was open and I guess it is an option if you are visiting in high season
reviews.title: Nice Place - would def stay again

reviews.text: All in all, a great stay in a lovely hotel which I would happily stay in again.
reviews.title: Nice break

reviews.text: I have been back to this hotel for the last 4 years. It is clean and nice plus the staff are friendly well I would say the bar staff a lot more that reception staff.
reviews.title: Good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ground floor pool view studio apartments are the best and the best price. There is a supermarket next door to the hotel and the old town is about a 10 minute walk if that.
reviews.title: Very nice Hotel, would go back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice pool nice view of the sea. Overall worth a visit to this hotel.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, central location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Have just got back after 4 nights staying here, and would most def go back.Hotel very clean,pool looked lovely but to cold for us to go in, but did use indoor pool which was like a bath. We stayed in a 1 bed apt overlooking pool it was massive with everything you could need.We also got free wifi with the hotel,you just need to ask at reception. We arrived late at night and asked if they had any milk etc, and we were sent to bar who gave us tea,coffee,milk and sugar which helped
reviews.title: main road

reviews.text: us till foloowing morning. Supermarket next door sells everything, and cake shop outside hotel is a must, their cakes are the best.Used the little train that pulls up outside hotel,3.50 euros all day and you can get on and off as you wish, very good service, although taxis are not expensive. We preferred old town to the strip area at night, and be sure to walk away from the square area as there are lots of lovely restaurents of the square. Nice walk to marina, with some lovely bars on the way some overlooking sea.
reviews.title: Great for kids and lively holidays

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Yes, I hate to recommend this Albufeira Portugal Hotel because it is so good. The more I say good things about it, the more people who will want to stay there and it will make it harder for me to get the reservation dates when I come back.
reviews.title: Hate to Recommend !!

reviews.text: This is the 4th stay here over the last few years and it is as good as it ever was - clean, well maintained, helpful staff, super pool and sunning area, pool bar/food, tennis, squash courts, indoor pool. This time we booked in for 17 days and took a studio suite instead of a one bedroom suite as we always had done. It worked out very well and saved us some money. Cleaned and maid service every day, cook top, fridge, pots, dishes, microwave, toaster etc. Only gripe is that the tv is old style tube and very small, time to install flat screens at least 30+ inches. Free wifi but kicked in and out too much for me. The restaurant down stairs is very good and reasonable especially for supper. This place is so convient - large grocery chain and assorted stores/fast foods right next door for continual food, wine and beer refurbishments. 10 min walk from one of best beaches in Portugal and old town Albufeira with it's bars, restaurants, stores, entertainment etc. Yes will are coming back again all the way from Canada.
reviews.title: Great hotel great location!

reviews.text: The Brisa Sol has been a destination of mine for the past 4 years. The rooms are very spacious & comfortable. The staff very friendly unlike the Spanish!! It's only a 15 minute walk from the Old Town. I've recommended it to lots of friends who have all had a great time there! Happy holidays!
reviews.title: Relaxing holiday

reviews.text: This Hotel is central to Albuferia which I would imagine in July/August may be a very different place. The hotel is very spacious and our rooms were cleaned and towels replaced every day. We had bed and breakfast for 4 days which made the holiday very affordable. In our one bedroomed Apartment cooking facilities were available, not used of course. The samsung television was flat screen and very modern not that we used it. The town has tons of resturants the choice is amazing. We were told the old town is hilly so we were suprised to find that they have installed esculators to ease your way to the beach and the shops. Good weather ensured our stay was spent mainly around the pool area. The outside beach bar serves good food and beer. I would return to this hotel without hesitation.
reviews.title: enjoyable stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: had a very lovely room 0008 which was a pool side room which made sunbathing perfect!!! tv was rather old but had very good english channels including bbc 1, itv3, channel 4 and 2 news stations.
reviews.title: Glad we went back!
